storyInfo: Lappland goes to jail in Texas's place. Leontuzzo sees the Signore dei Lupi, and Sora realizes that the member of the audience she spoke with was the author of 'La Morte di Texas.'

attributes.content: No one told me about this!
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: Me neither.
attributes.name: Loyal Mafioso

attributes.content: Did she act on her own?
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: Don't worry about it.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: I chose to let her do it.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Don Alberto! But why?
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: A gold coin can mean very different things in different circumstances.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: The Bellones will not have their way.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: What's a little smirch on our reputation, if it means we cut another piece of flesh off Bernardo?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Loyal Mafioso

attributes.content: What should we do now?
attributes.name: Loyal Mafioso

attributes.content: Prepare my car. I'm going to see my daughter.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Yes, Don Alberto.
attributes.name: Loyal Mafioso

attributes.content: By the way, where is Danbrown now?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Danbrown? I think he's working at a carwash.
attributes.name: Loyal Mafioso

attributes.content: Give me the address.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Are you calling him back?
attributes.name: Loyal Mafioso

attributes.content: I never permitted him to leave the famiglia.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Loyal Mafioso

attributes.content: And prepare a banquet.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: For...?
attributes.name: Loyal Mafioso

attributes.content: A feast for the heir to Famiglia Bellone.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Let me go!
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: We caught the assassins, thanks to Lappland's tip-off.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: They've been identified as having taken part in Leontuzzo's assassination.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: Do you two know her?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Hey.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Nothing good ever comes of dealing with you, Lappland.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Look on the bright side. It's not every day that you get to sit in a Siracusan cell.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Lock them up.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Yes, Your Honor.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: You were the one who waylaid Cellinia, and ordered the bombing of Carracci...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Is that still your story?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You sure are persistent, aren't you?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Don't you and Bellone want to get this case closed as quickly as you can?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Does it matter if it was me or Texas who did it?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You really should hang me, Your Honor.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I'm just a pawn my famiglia cast aside. Surely, you can do it.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Imagine the positive impact that my death will have on justice in Siracusa.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Isn't it worth a try?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I don't know what you're planning.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But I'll do exactly that, if you really are the culprit, Lappland Saluzzo.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: First, there's someone I have to see.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Welcome back, Don Bernardo.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Take a break. You've been working hard.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Yes, Don Bernardo.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Not happy?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: How could I be?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Come with me.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: There are some things that you have to know.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Why did you bring me here?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: My lord.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Bernardo. Are you asking me to tame your unruly cub now?
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: He just needs to understand something.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: What are you—
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I am il Signore dei Lupi, cub.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Leontuzzo feels a daze at the words 'Signore dei Lupi'.
Fragments of knowledge and memory rush into his mind and take shape.
The Signori dei Lupi. Sovereign of beasts.
Beings that were never born. They have existed since time immemorial.
Zaaro is a sovereign of beasts.
He and his kind have borne witness to the path that the wolfpack tread on the wildness.
They are engaged in a killing game, guided by their own nature.
The Signori dei Lupi are immortal.
They gain no satisfaction from fighting amongst themselves, so they have set rules for their game.
Each Signore dei Lupi grooms a human to hunt the others.
These are the Fangs of the Signore dei Lupi.
The one with the last Fang standing becomes the alpha.
Signore dei Lupi, the hunt, Fangs...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Could it be...?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Your father has been an excellent Fang.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Rubio, Don Alberto is holding a banquet for Famiglia Bellone.
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: We'll need the best food.
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: Could it really be Saluzzo?
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Rubio?
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: Oh, it's nothing.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Let me think... ordinary hospitality won't do when the Bellones are involved.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Please inform Don Alberto that it would be my honor to prepare the banquet, personally.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: I eagerly await his response.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: In Columbia, a show of kindness by a mafioso often results in the subject becoming a chip in a bargain.
The more one cares, the higher the cost.
In Siracusa, the subject may take their last breath on a dark, rainy street.
The more one cares, the greater the pain.
One must become cold and heartless.
Texas knows that well, and detests it.
I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: No need to apologize to me.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You can leave after some paperwork, if you want.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Procedurally, you're no longer a suspect.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I'm not worried. It's quieter here in jail.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Haven't you given up yet?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Do you really think your old friend did it?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: It's her style, but I don't see the motive.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Then it's not time to give up.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Signorina Lavinia, Famiglia Rossati sends word that Signor Wallach would like to speak with Signorina Cellinia.
attributes.name: Bellone Mafioso

attributes.content: Well... no rest for the wicked, then.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Lavinia realizes that Texas put something in her pocket as she passed by.
She reaches into it and finds a note.
There is a phone number and a short message scribbled in a corner:
'Penguin Logistics delivers, rain or shine.'
Signor, if you have to sleep, can you at least put your legs down?
attributes.name: Unhappy Audience Member

attributes.content: ...Hmm?
Are you talking to me?
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Who else? How could you sleep in the theater?
attributes.name: Unhappy Audience Member

attributes.content: And to put your feet up like that! How rude!
attributes.name: Unhappy Audience Member

attributes.content: I'm not blocking you, am I?
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: No, but it's really off-putting to have someone so rude beside me!
attributes.name: Unhappy Audience Member

attributes.content: Alright, I'll put my legs down.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Hey, why do you have food with you?
attributes.name: Unhappy Audience Member

attributes.content: We don't sell food here.
attributes.name: Theater Manager

attributes.content: Yeah, I bought it at the corner store, since you don't sell popcorn here.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Is it your first time here?
attributes.name: Theater Manager

attributes.content: A friend suggested I come here to relax.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: What do you think of the performance?
attributes.name: Theater Manager

attributes.content: I don't really understand what's going on.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Why are they doing that?
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Escort this gentleman out.
attributes.name: Theater Manager

attributes.content: He's not welcome here.
attributes.name: Theater Manager

attributes.content: Hey, I bought a ticket!
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Give him a refund.
attributes.name: Theater Manager

attributes.content: Right away.
attributes.name: Flippant Security Guard

attributes.content: Come with us, signor.
attributes.name: Flippant Security Guard

attributes.content: And get the hell out.
attributes.name: Flippant Security Guard

attributes.content: Say, I saw him when the show started.
attributes.name: Harsh Security Guard

attributes.content: I thought he was some rich boy out to experience society.
attributes.name: Harsh Security Guard

attributes.content: Turns out it was a poor cazzo who knows nothing about opera.
attributes.name: Harsh Security Guard

attributes.content: Did you like what they were doing on stage?
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Of course. The actors looked nice.
attributes.name: Flippant Security Guard

attributes.content: And the songs were beautiful.
attributes.name: Flippant Security Guard

attributes.content: Is that what they call 'art'?
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Stick to the bars, pleb.
attributes.name: Flippant Security Guard

attributes.content: Oh yeah, here's your ticket money.
attributes.name: Flippant Security Guard

attributes.content: Don't you dare say we took it.
attributes.name: Flippant Security Guard

attributes.content: What's that? You wanna do this the hard way?
attributes.name: Flippant Security Guard

attributes.content: Hey, this guy's strong.
attributes.name: Flippant Security Guard

attributes.content: I need some help here!
attributes.name: Flippant Security Guard

attributes.content: Something's not right with his eyes.
attributes.name: Harsh Security Guard

attributes.content: A-Aaaahh! My arm! It's gonna break!
attributes.name: Flippant Security Guard

attributes.content: H-Hold it right there!
attributes.name: Flippant Security Guard

attributes.content: Just let it go, don't waste your time with a cazzo like that.
attributes.name: Harsh Security Guard

attributes.content: C'mon, let's get you bandaged up.
attributes.name: Harsh Security Guard

attributes.content: Sorry, Signorina Lavinia...
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Doesn't look like this is something for me.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Guess I should find a bar to get myself drunk, then spend the night at the porno theater.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Want a drink?
Danbrown looks in the direction the voice came from.
He sees a man leaning by the side of the alley, shaking a bottle in his hand.
I want an explanation, Lappland.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Isn't this what you wanted?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Help the Bellones when they're at their weakest, control them, and dominate them, rather than destroy them.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I thought I taught you.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: I taught you what to do in times like this.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Oh, I forgot. It's been years since I left, you know.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I can have you ignoring the business I give you, or you going against me.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: You're my daughter, after all.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: I'm a forgiving man, but I can't let you go over my head to make decisions for the famiglia.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Even if you did actually guess what I wanted to do.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: I am don of our famiglia.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Seven years ago, I kicked you out for this. Seven years later, you came back and did it again.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: You knew it would infuriate me. You knew it was the only thing that could infuriate me.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Why did you do it, figlia mia?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Because nothing else brings me joy, padre mio.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I wanted to know if it's really your position that matters most.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I've always wanted to know.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Lappland raises herself from the ground with great effort.
Her face is full of joy, as though this was what she came back to Siracusa for.
Time's up, boss.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: That'll be all for today.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: That's all?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You defied me.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: But you're still my daughter.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: You know what I want, better than anyone.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: All you're missing is discipline.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: It's my fault for not educating you properly.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: But there's still time.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: So all the Signori dei Lupi live amongst us?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: No, he's the only one who involves himself in human society.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: The rest of them stay out in the wildness.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: He believes that the authority over man is a form of power.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: And he wants to use it to triumph over the other Signori dei Lupi.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: So he wants you to overthrow Signora Sicilia, become the de facto ruler of Siracusa, and help him win his fight with his kind?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You, me, the entire famiglia, we're all tools to him.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Did you think I was going to accept that?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: How could you accept being a puppet your entire life?!
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Figlio mio, there's one thing you've misunderstood.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: He taught me how to win power, just as I taught you.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Using it to defeat the other Fangs is just a part.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Every decision that I made, including what I'm doing now, is my own.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.text: How can you be so sure?

attributes.content: (No, he's serious.)
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: (Look at him, the strength of his character, he's no puppet.)
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: We're each other's tools, instruments for our mutual victory. That's all.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Boss, the Saluzzos have sent their invitation.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Don Alberto would like Signor Leon to attend his banquet.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Sigh.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I've lost count of how many times you sighed today, Sora.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Can't be helped, considering what happened at the trial.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: How about we raid the prison?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Ya lost yer darned mind?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: At least we'd get to see her.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I wouldn't recommend it.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: What are you doing here, Miss Caterina?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That's my line, Sora. Why are you out here? It's dangerous.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: I live nearby.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You do? Did you get scammed?
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: It's fine, she's got me n' Exusiai.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Who's this, Sora?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Oh, I met Caterina a few days ago over at the theater.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Well... I guess it's fine, if you have friends you can count on.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Oh, don't worry about me. A noisy place like this is conductive to my creative work.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Creative work... say, the playwright behind La Morte di Texas is named Caterina too. Could you be...?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Uh-huh.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Wow! No wonder you knew so much about the Texas Family!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I read that one! Even I could tell it's one humdinger of a script!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Can I get yer autograph?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Sure. Not that it's worth anything right now.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Le Morty de Texas is gonna be a blockbuster! You'n bet on that!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Back to what you just said...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You look like you can take care of yourselves, and I wouldn't put it past you to actually get it done, if it was any other Siracusan prison.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: But things aren't so easy here in Volsinii, with Lavinia around.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: The eyes of all the famiglie are on that place. You don't know what trouble you might stir up, if you act rashly.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Heh, we were just kiddin' around.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: You didn't look like you were.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: May I ask a question?
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Okay?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Do you know Cellinia well?
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Sit.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: There's an unwritten rule in art and writing.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: You can base your work on the famiglia, but you can't mention a real famiglia by name.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: I've heard that.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: But somebody put 'La Morte di Texas' out there.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: The first work to use the name of a real famiglia.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: And?
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: That means the famiglie aren't trying to stay in the shadows anymore. They're out to take center stage.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: All thanks to the Columbians.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: A lot's changed since the Columbians got mixed up in the Siracusan art scene.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Unscrupulous artists—or rather, craftsmen—pumped out work that's starting to stink.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: They're not making observations about life, they're making pale imitations of it. As long as audiences are willing to shell out money for it.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: It's just a mosaic of pop culture. What was popular yesterday shows up in theaters tomorrow.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Real quality is buried under garbage, which becomes all you find when you look for art.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Isn't that terrible?
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: If it's what everybody likes, then what you call 'art' sounds like garbage.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Some think like that, but not everyone.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: There are those who would like to keep good art from being buried, but they don't know how to fight the tide.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: That old timey opera didn't appeal to me.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: But you never escaped the past, did you?
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Who are you?
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Benthonexigios. You'll find my name in the reviews section of Volsinii Arts Weekly.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Ben...
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Just call me Ben.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Ben...
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: I... I've got my thoughts about what Siracusa's become.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: People up high say we oughta solve our problems in more civilized ways.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: But when I try to do something all civilized, things turn out the same as they always did.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Why do we fool ourselves like that, when we don't actually have to?
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: The famiglie know how things are trending, but no one wants to give what they already had.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Want a drink?
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: That wine's not cheap.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: It's not.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: And this is a cheap pizzeria.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: It is.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Why pair a wine like that with pizza like that?
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Because the wine is worth the same as the pizza to me.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: The wine is certainly finely made, but just as much care was put into growing the wheat that ended up in this pizza.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Is there really that much of a difference in value between them, if you take away the trappings of civilization?
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Do you believe in these things?
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: The trappings of civilization?
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Like the label on this wine. Slap it on something, and you're free to feed on the people whom you've fooled.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: So Cellinia fled to Lungmen, and you are her friends...
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Hard to believe, isn't it?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: No, I believe it.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: First, there's no need for you to lie. Second, I always thought there was a chance she was still alive.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Now I understand why she suddenly showed up.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: I guess she made a deal with the Bellones, and now she's here to pay her debt.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Definitely sounds like her.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But what a coincidence it is that you found the Compagnia dell'alba... (whispers) or perhaps it's no coincidence...
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: What's special about that company?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Nothing. It's nothing.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: The Compagnia dell'alba is a good place to start, if you want to get close to Famiglia Bellone.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: But... well, come with me.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: What's this place...?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: It's my home.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Wow, books and papers everywhere.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Haha, sorry about that. I didn't have time to clean up.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Take this, Sora.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: A key?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Yes. It can be dangerous outside. Come here, if you want to practice.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: It's quieter, and I have plenty of scripts you can look at.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Just think of it as making a new friend.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Alright!
attributes.name: Sora
